products.title: Ex-Lite PVC Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Ex-Lite PVC Blackout Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £10.09 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Ex-Lite PVC Blackout range is sleek, stylish and contemporary. Available in different colours and types with a useful blackout feature. 
 Transform your space with this elegant, black roller blind all at an affordable price. 
 
 Product ID: DB-RBX0920 Fabric Colour: Black Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Oslo Blackout Black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Oslo Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product ID: DB-PRBX0006 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Genesis Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis Blackout Black Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £9.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Give definition to your room design with the bold black finish of this Genesis Blackout Black Roller Blind. This simple solution for dressing any window will have maximum effect thanks to the striking dark colour and impressive blackout function. The blackout fabric is ideal for blocking out light, keeping in warmth and aiding in easy sleeping.
